short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically plays the next short video on YouTube Shorts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform Your YouTube Shorts Experience!

Do you often lose track of time while browsing through endless YouTube Shorts? Tired of the repetitive and tedious task of hitting the down arrow key to watch the next short? Say goodbye to that hassle! Our Chrome extension is here to revolutionize your viewing experience. 

Introducing Autoplay for YouTube Shorts!
Dive into a world of uninterrupted entertainment as our extension automatically queues up the next short, allowing you to sit back and enjoy without lifting a finger. 

Why Choose Our Extension?
- Seamless Autoplay: Automatically plays the next short after the current one ends, so you can immerse yourself in endless content.
- Easy Controls: Pause and play autoplay directly from the menu for complete control over your viewing experience.
- Smart Pausing: Automatically pauses autoplay when you switch tabs, ensuring you never miss a moment.
- Dark Mode: Enjoy comfortable viewing even in low-light environments with our sleek dark mode option.

Getting Started Is Easy!
Experience hassle-free viewing with just a few simple steps:
1. Open the YouTube homepage.
2. Click on 'Shorts'.
3. Select your first short and let the magic happen!
4. Sit back, relax, and enjoy an uninterrupted stream of Shorts!

Your feedback is invaluable! We’d love to hear your thoughts and suggestions on how we can make this extension even better. Please leave a review below—your input helps us improve!

Thank you for choosing our extension, and happy watching!
